sentence.Network_en: He teed off on the new pitcher's first delivery and sent it over the centerfield wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 他猛击新投手所投的第一球而将之击出中外野墙外.

sentence.Network_en: He hit a double to deep centerfield.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一个二垒打把球击到远处中外场.

list.abs: 2台发电机可并联（Centerfielder型号） Datasheet  Brochure  Whitepaper  Press release  Manual  High quality photo  May 15th - M.

auth_sentence.content: An inning later, Pujols slammed a two-run blast that travelled 406 feet over the centerfield fence.

auth_sentence.content: Cervelli, meanwhile, launched two throws into centerfield as the Red Sox stole their way around the bases.

auth_sentence.content: Two innings later, Beltre was at it again, swatting a 2-1 fastball from Hellickson into the right centerfield seats.
